援.definition: to help; to assist; to aid

援交.definition: abbr. for 援助交際|援助交际[yuan2 zhu4 jiao1 ji4]

援交妹.definition: prostitute (slang); see also 援助交際|援助交际[yuan2 zhu4 jiao1 ji4]

援交小姐.definition: girl who engages in enjo-kōsai; see also 援助交際|援助交际[yuan2 zhu4 jiao1 ji4]

援助.definition: to help; to support; to aid; aid; assistance

援助交際.definition: Enjo-kōsai or "compensated dating", a practice which originated in Japan where older men give money or luxury gifts to women for their companionship and sexual favors

援助機構.definition: relief agency; emergency service; rescue organization

援引.definition: to quote; to cite; to recommend (a friend, an associate etc)

援手.definition: assistance; a helping hand; to lend a hand

援救.definition: to come to the aid of; to save; to rescue from danger; to relieve

援藏.definition: pro-Tibet; to support Tibet; to support Tibetan independence
